description:
We’ve heard stories about CV patients worsening and dying from ventilators. Here’s yet another account from a nurse practitioner speaking on behalf of a fellow nurse working at a NYC hospital, who wants to remain anonymous out of fear of losing her job. The accusations are horrifying. When CV patients are treated in the hospital, they’re asked to sign a “do not resuscitate” form. Medical personnel in NY were recently advised to not resuscitate CV patients; to prevent the spread of the virus. So, what this nurse says doesn’t sound so far fetched. . .
.
.
.
.
.

via @kellybroganmd @the_wake_up_q .
.
.
